invitations.title: Convite para trabalhar na {{company}}
invitations.companyXInvitedYou: A quinta {{name}} pretende contratar-te como {{role}} na app farmerJoe.
invitations.toAcceptNonUser: Para aceitar o convite, instala a app farmerJoe e regista-te com o teu endereço eletrónico {{email}}. Depois poderás aceitar o convite na aplicação.
invitations.toAcceptExistingUser: Para aceitar o convite, inicia o farmerJoe e carrega em Aceitar.
invitations.ifYouHaveAccountWithOtherEmail: Se já tens uma conta farmerJoe com outro endereço eletrónico, pde ao {{name}} para te convidar para esse endereço eletrónico.

labInvitations.title: Access to {{labName}}'s analyses management page
labInvitations.XgivenAccessToYou: {{inviter}} has given you access to {{labName}}'s analyses management page.
labInvitations.accountCreatedForYou: An account has been created for you:
labInvitations.changePassword: You can change your password by using the user menu in the top right corner of the page.

analysisDeadline.title: The deadline for the analysis {{analyse_number}} is near

newApiKey.subject: A new API key for {{company}}
newApiKey.title: New API key
newApiKey.message: A new API key ({{keyName}}) for {{company}} was created by {{created_by}}.

updatedApiKey.subject: An API key for {{company}} was updated
updatedApiKey.title: API key update
updatedApiKey.message: An API key ({{keyName}}) for {{company}} was updated by {{created_by}}.

passwordReset.title: Reset your password farmerJoe
passwordReset.requestedReset: We received a request to reset your farmerJoe password. Click on the button below to chose a new one
passwordReset.ifyoudidntask: If you did not make this request you can ignore this mail.
